001001 00000 00001 0101010101010101     # addi $r0 $r1
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $f1 $r1
001001 00000 00001 0000000000000100     # addi $r0 $r1 4
110010 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # swc1 $f1 $r1 0 # memory[1] = $f1

001001 00000 00001 0011001100110011     # addi $r0 $r1
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $f1 $r1
110010 00001 00000 0000000000001000     # swc1 $f1 $r0 8 # memory[2] = $f1

001001 00000 00001 0000111100001111     # addi $r0 $r1
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $f1 $r1
001001 00000 00001 0000000000000110     # addi $r0 $r1 6
110010 00001 00001 0000000000000110     # swc1 $f1 $r1 6 # memory[3] = $f1

110000 00000 00010 0000000000000100     # lwc1 $r0 $f2 4 # $f2 = memory[1]
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $f2
0000000000000000   0101010101010101

001001 00000 00001 0000000000001100     # addi $r0 $r1 12
110000 00001 00010 1111111111111100     # lwc1 $r1 $f2 -4 # $f2 = memory[2]
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $f2
0000000000000000   0011001100110011

001001 00000 00001 1111111111111100     # addi $r0 $r1 -4
110000 00001 00010 0000000000010000     # lwc1 $r1 $f2 16 # $f2 = memory[3]
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $f2
0000000000000000   0000111100001111

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
